subject: National Invitation Tournament
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: No. 2 seed Penn State took that honor by beating No. 3 Baylor, 69-63, in the N.I.T. final Thursday night at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: No. 2 seed Penn State took that honor by beating No. 3 Baylor, 69-63, in the N.I.T. final Thursday night at Madison Square Garden.
